string.value: Sakura of Showa Town has lost something. I should go talk to her and help find it!

I think she lost the #b#t04000154##k that she received from Dr. Hikekuro. She dropped it at the riverbank, and it's probably floated its way to the sea by now. 
Come to think of it, recently a monster by the name of #b#o3230405##k have been collecting dolls. I should go check it out...

#t04000154# #b#c04000154##k/100
Phew, I gathered up as much as I could. Fortunately Sakura found the one that Dr. Hikekuro gave her. Thank goodness!
Arrrrgh! I lost the #b#t04000154##k that I received from my plastic surgeon!
You know, a few days ago, I dropped it into a river, and I'm too afraid to swim, so I watched it helplessly float along the shore. It probably ended up somewhere in the ocean. Probably.
I really liked that doll... I feel bad for the plastic surgeon that gave me the doll. Hey ... if you ever make your way to the sea, please find #b#t04000154##k for me!
Thank you~! \nI don't care if it is of the same shape or not. I want the #b#t04000154##k the plastic surgeon gave me. I'll be here waiting.
Wow, incredible! That's so many #b#t04000154#s#k!! There may be the one that the plastic surgeon gave me in the midst of all this. I better start looking!
...\nThis is it!!! I found the #b#t04000154##k that the plastic surgeon gave me!! Thank you so much!! Here's a reward. Please take it!
I don't think there's the #b#t04000154##k that I'm looking for. Keep looking!
